history.content:
Are you interested in building reliable cyber-physical systems? :)

The Lingua Franca (LF) project is looking for summer collaborators to work on 5 exciting research projects. Here are the project descriptions:

1. LF for PRET machines
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1zuFwlIuK4GiDwraN4bpTsqUyEIEPVU60X6qOw3I1uaw/edit?usp=sharing

2. LF for Heterogeneous Systems
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Dlqj0u357vvP10BuvYpCiKp8IsvimnSN_C76dVwCjSo/edit?usp=sharing

3. LF for EECS149 Labs
https://docs.google.com/document/d/140wsSwpHYd1htIaiXthPL3LYXX7HHw0iPb-_GxMNLxQ/edit?usp=sharing

4. LF for Edge Cloud
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1XAqp4VPaLu8ZzzvhF0q_lwfNTowtNgYQzUqFP13lrv0/edit?usp=sharing

5. LF for Autonomous Vehicles
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1nt71xKZQUacY15kJ7yCbtda23gQURqrw1xjw44mk-LA/edit?usp=sharing

Project details and the application portal can be found here: https://forms.gle/3yMkFUzuoCgUD2mk6

If you have any questions, please contact Shaokai (shaokai@berkeley.edu).

Thanks and I look forward to having a productive summer with you all.
history.subject: Lingua Franca (LF) Summer 22 Research Opportunities
